ABOUT ACCELERATE 

Accelerate is a virtual collaboration platform to help you collect payments in session, schedule calls, and transcribe meetings. 

With Accelerate, you can automatically screen prospective clients with customized qualifying questions, get paid on the call with a live payment system, and review meeting summaries and action items through in-app live transcription.
